original_text: So Gideon went into his house and prepared a young goat and unleavened cakes from an ephah of flour. The meat he put in a basket, and the broth he put in a pot, and brought them to him under the terebinth and presented them.
korean_text: 기드온이 가서 염소 새끼 하나를 준비하고 가루 한 에바로 무교병을 만들고 고기를 소쿠리에 담고 국을 양푼에 담아 상수리나무 아래 그에게로 가져다가 드리매

sentences.original_text: So Gideon went into his house
and unleavened cakes from an ephah of flour
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 에바의 밀가루로 누룩 없는 떡을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: The meat he put in a basket
and the broth he put in a pot
and brought them to him under the terebinth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 들고 상수리나무 아래 그에게 갔습니다
